Texture Manager Squ3 Play Marketplace Read More

Make your own NFTs

Our game is based around custom textures. With the help of our upcoming Texture Creator, you'll be able to not only upload your own textures, but create them in-game.

Freedom is key. That's why we want to let the players choose the direction the game is going to go. Head over to the Texture manager in the top-left corner to upload your own, custom player spritesheet :)

Explore the Marketplace

List your own textures for sale or buy from others. The only limit is your imagination.
